name: Blown'up
description:
Description:

You start in a closed area where you have to place bombs and blow up obstacles that are in your way. The goal is to get to the finish line before the other player gets there. There are different ways you can choose to go through the level, some ways are longer than other but there may be more power ups on them. Read more about the power ups in "how to play".

Trello:

https://trello.com/invite/b/X6UOOtbZ/e800084be911fddf642319b050795454/ccp-game

 Credit list: 

The music in Level 1,2,3,4,5 is non copyright music from youtube.

All of the art in the game. - Lovísa

Game design- Lovísa

The scripts. - Stefán

Function - Stefán

Note: The mute button works in unity!
